Message:
The teachers called it,
“The Philosopher’s Stone.”

What appeared at a glance to be
nothing but an ordinary seed,

was actually an unknown organism
bearing no resemblance to any
previously discovered lifeform.

It was said to hold all
the knowledge of this world
in its shell casing, just like a god.

For the sake of reading
its “memories,” the seed was
implanted in me from
the moment of my birth.

I was created solely to become
the seed’s incubator.

But, exactly because
I grew alongside it,
I know its true nature.

This is a demon’s seed.
If we carelessly allow it
to keep growing,
one day, it’ll...

Well, whenever that happens,
I’ll be dead as a doornail,
so it’s got nothin’ to do with me.
